name: Imagination(DEMO)
description:
Experience the limits of the human mind in Action Horror game where you play as Max, a thirty year old man who lost in a tragic car accident. Find the way out to escape  this Nightmare.

CREDITS

Project Manager :Suntananon Nivasabutra

Game Design : Suntananon Nivasabutra

Sound Design : Suntananon Nivasabutra

Programming : Suntananon Nivasabutra

Art & Assets : Suntananon Nivasabutra

Yes!!!   I develop all this game with myself.

CONTEXT

I hope you'll enjoy our game and feel free to give us some feedback so we can improve the player's experience.

And last thing, check the Development log below to stay updated about our work .

Default Controls

Z-USE Knife

D-Defence

A-USE Item

S-USE GL

Q-SELECT Item

W-SELECT GL Effect

X-MENU

Arrow Key-Movement

Shift-Run
